extendedInfo.description: Robot Defense is a unique tower-based defense game: abundant towers + hero, which makes it a lot more challenging and fun!Hero/Heroine:# Warrior: the strong soldier with incredible power who terrifies enemies with âShakeâem offâ and âTransformationâ skills;# Assassin: the nimble killer with poisoned weapons who terrifies enemies with âGhost Attackâ and âPoison Touchâ skills;# Magian: the wise wizard who can cast the lost spells âBlizzardâ to freeze enemies, and âFinger of Godâ to power up your defense towers.Towers:Gun Tower: low damage, short range, always the must;Missile Tower: medium damage, long range, good at defeating air force;Electric Tower: super high damage, medium range, the boss killer;Glue Tower: low cost, slowing down an enemy, use it wisely to restrict a boss;Ice Tower: slow down multiple enemies, medium range.Energy Tower: increase surrounding towers' attack power;Flame Tower: attack multiple enemies, handy weapon to handle a large wave of enemies.Bounce Tower: bounce attack, taking out dispersed enemies with one shoot;Laser Tower: attack enemies in a line, super long range, the coolest ultimate weapon.Enemies:Variant creatures, robot monsters, aliens, hi-tech battle cruisers, etc.Ready to fight, Commander?

reviews.title: glitchy
reviews.comment: earlier would have rated higher but now because of constant glitches in the game I have not been able to get past one level. and if I do look like I\'m close the game freezes then throws me out losing where I was at really frustrating.
reviews.author: Tori Cottle

reviews.title: Update pls
reviews.comment: My device is samsung s2, jellybean. This game randomly  crashes. Thanks!
reviews.author: Jun Adar

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Game is fun but frustrating. Crashes alot.
reviews.author: Brian Bricker

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: I don t know what happened it was going good then suddenly it got stuck and crashes again and again. I m stuck to a level and cannot pass it through.
reviews.author: Binot Mutum

reviews.title: Passable for a free game
reviews.comment: This is a third rate TD game with shoddy production values,  flooded with ads that annoy.   Not sure why most users rate it highly,  when there are far better games out there .   Buying in-game currency does not improve the experience.   Play only if you refuse to pay for a decent game.
reviews.author: Haoyong Lee

reviews.title: good idea but quickly get annoying
reviews.comment: The idea behind the game is good but it quicky gets annoying as its pay for play system kicks in.  The charge system needs to be removed as it can take up to 4 hours to fully recharge, severly limiting game play.  Cost of upgrading the heroes and equipment gets outrageous quickly.  For me, after level 9, any stage, usually after substage 23, bugs in the game caused the game to spontaneous restart, freeze, or caused a system restart, affecting the charge  count also.  Random error messages keep popping up.
reviews.author: James Fields

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good game.
reviews.author: ramil salinas

reviews.title: Hey
reviews.comment: Having to use \"\"energy to play is stupid get rid of that and I would rate 4 more .. JUST LET US PLAY!
reviews.author: Man Dudue

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Spent $30 on points for weapon upgrade, now freezes on level 11. Not happy. Want my money back or problem fixed.
reviews.author: Richard Ruggiero

reviews.title: Great game when it works
reviews.comment: No matter how many times I try to complete level 11, the game just closes. I tried each character and all with the same result. I would hate to uninstall just to start over again as I have many weapon upgrades. I wish they would fix this, then it would be a five star game
reviews.author: Larry Dubin

reviews.title: Sucks!!!!
reviews.comment: Keeps closing in the middle of the game and you have to wait for the energy to refill. sucks!!!!!

reviews.title: cool!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: fantastic

reviews.comment: Fun unique tower defense game very fun and many different ways to play\tFunfunfun Fun unique tower defense game very fun and many different ways to play
